column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////Aside from the amazing chocolate chip cookie
column2: I also really like their Kouign-amann. Crispy
column5: this is another one of my favorites here. Their almond croissant and chocolate croissants are also good
column6: but I wasn't particularly blown away by them compared to other French bakeries around town. Their macarons are decent too
column7: somewhat larger than normal. I tried the citrus and the salted caramel. Salted caramel was good
column8: but I would skip the citrus next time.
